programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Episódios 1-2
programme.desc: Um Clássico de Futebol | Território Inimigo

programme.title: Episódios 3-4
programme.desc: A maldição | Os Vizinhos

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora da Bundesliga e jogadora do AC Milan Julia Simic parte de Nuremberga para apanhar Dafina Redzepi (TSG Hoffenheim) e visitar Bärbel Wohlleben, que tem a honra de ter sido a primeira mulher que marcou um Golo do Mês da ARD Sportschau. Julia mostra-nos o campo de futebol que criou para que as raparigas possam começar a jogar, enquanto Bärbel recorda os seus anos de infância e o modo como a federação alemã de futebol (DFB) baniu as mulheres da prática do futebol profissional. As três irão jogar nas margens do Reno enquanto conversam sobre a paixão que partilham pelo futebol.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Tenerife | La Palma
programme.desc: A aventura continua em Tenerife, com uma primeira prova que terá os impressionantes Acantilados de los Gigantes como pano de fundo e um catamarã e uma corrida de estafetas em caiaques como protagonistas para obter o máximo de "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. As equipas poderão obter mais objetos na Candelaria, no seu Conjunto Monumental de los Menceyes e na misteriosa Cueva del Viento. Uma nova surpresa final espera aí pelas equipas...

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 3 - 4
programme.desc: O primeiro desafio é criar um visual na mais importante das circunstâncias: o casamento. As noivas sabem exatamente aquilo que querem quando entram no salão. Irão escolher o seu cabeleireiro, com quem terão um diálogo para definir a sua visão. Num desafio como este, falhar está fora de questão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares. Em seguida, os participantes irão trabalhar nos cuidados capilares, restaurando o cabelo danificado dos clientes do salão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares.

programme.title: In The Turn
programme.desc: “In The Turn”. Always forward and never straight. At the age of three, Crystal said that she was a girl despite being born in a boy's body. Ever since her mother bought her a skirt shortly after, a difficult journey began for Crystal, whose transition has since suffered all kinds of harassment that at the age of five led her to consider taking her own life. The discovery of "Vagine Regime", a queer collective of Roller Derby, becomes Crystal's great hope to be able to play in a team of girls, an opportunity that was always denied in her school.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: River Memories
programme.desc: Uma comunidade está prestes a desaparecer. Os habitantes de Platz, um enorme bairro de lata em Turim, Itália, defrontam-se com um plano imposto pelo governo e veem-se ameaçados pelo despejo. Este filme documenta os últimos meses do bairro.

programme.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Assinado pelo realizador nomeado para um óscar Dana Adam Shapiro, este filme intrépido apresenta-nos a história do sucesso repentino das Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders como uma metáfora para o clímax da revolução sexual dos EUA.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.title: Os Segredos de La Roja – Campeões do Mundo 2010
programme.desc: No dia 11 de julho de 2010, a equipa nacional de Espanha alcançou o seu objetivo de vencer a Copa do Mundo, uma vitória que foi sentida pela equipa e pelo país como um todo. Apesar desse final bem-sucedido, “La Roja” teve que superar várias lutas e dificuldades para se tornar lendário. A equipa chegou à África do Sul com o triunfo do Campeonato Europeu de Futebol de 2008 e Vicente del Bosque a liderar o trajeto. Havia um sentimento geral de favoritismo atribuído a ""La Roja"" e, embora a derrota contra a Suíça no primeiro jogo tenha sido chocante, motivou Del Bosque e a sua equipa a unirem-se e a concentrarem-se com uma única intenção: bom futebol; e um objetivo: fazer história.

programme.title: Bojan, por trás do sorriso
programme.desc: Depois de retirar-se dos relvados aos 32 anos, Bojan Krkic decide contar a sua história. Através de uma conversa com o psicanalista que o tratou quando da sua estreia com o FC Barcelona aos 16 anos, o documentário explora as dificuldades enfrentadas por um talento precoce e sensível no mundo cruel do futebol. Jogadores que testemunharam a sua carreira de perto, tais como Thierry Henry, Andrés Iniesta e Zlatan Ibrahimovic, partilham o seu ponto de vista sobre Bojan, o futebolista, e Bojan, a pessoa, e refletem sobre a pressão, saúde mental e gestão de expetativas.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora de três medalhas olímpicas e Treinadora Feminina do Ano de 2012 da FIFA Pia Sundhage conta-nos como se sentiu quando foi convocada pela primeira vez pela seleção nacional feminina sueca. Pia acredita que o futebol lhe ofereceu um modo de vida. Pia conversa com Stina Blackstenius, vencedora de uma medalha de bronze na Copa do Mundo Feminina da FIFA e vencedora de duas medalhas de prata em Jogos Olímpicos, e com Molly Johansson, ambas jogadoras do BK Häcken. Stina conversa com as duas jogadoras sobre o que sentiu quando participou nos Jogos Olímpicos, e como jogar em França a tornou mais forte, enquanto Molly revela as suas metas para o futuro.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 3-4
programme.desc: Episódio 3 - Gran Canaria | Episódio 4 - Tenerife

programme.title: In The Turn
programme.desc: “In The Turn”. Always forward and never straight. At the age of three, Crystal said that she was a girl despite being born in a boy's body. Ever since her mother bought her a skirt shortly after, a difficult journey began for Crystal, whose transition has since suffered all kinds of harassment that at the age of five led her to consider taking her own life. The discovery of "Vagine Regime", a queer collective of Roller Derby, becomes Crystal's great hope to be able to play in a team of girls, an opportunity that was always denied in her school.

programme.title: The Australian Dream (2019)
programme.desc: O Australian Dream é um documentário que utiliza a notável e inspiradora história do legendário aborígene da AFL Adam Goodes como o prisma para contar uma história mais profunda e poderosa sobre raça, identidade e pertença. O filme irá descompactar os eventos das temporadas da AFL 2013-15 e fará perguntas fundamentais sobre a natureza do racismo e da discriminação na sociedade atual. O escritor premiado de Walkley, Stan Grant, e o premiado diretor do BAFTA, Daniel Gordon, unem forças para contar essa história notável de um dos jogadores mais condecorados e célebres da história da AFL.

programme.title: Give Up Tomorrow
programme.desc: Nas Filipinas, um homem inocente enfrenta a pena de morte num polêmico caso de assassinato que separou duas famílias e uma nação inteira.

programme.title: Djon Africa
programme.desc: Miguel ouviu dizer que se parece muito com o seu pai, a quem nunca conheceu. Nesta história acompanhamo-lo numa busca poética por esse homem desconhecido entre as memórias e mitologias africanas.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A família Flores toma o pequeno-almoço, o almoço e o jantar a pensar em futebol. As jovens irmãs Tatiana e Silvana treinam com o seu pai, um ex-jogador mexicano, e recebem dele toda a experiência de que precisam para a sua carreira. Kelly Smith, uma genuína lenda do futebol e a maior marcadora na história da seleção nacional feminina inglesa, espera por elas em sua casa. Antes de se encontrar com as irmãs Flores, partilha com as câmaras do programa os momentos mais duros da sua carreira. Entretanto, Lucy Bronze (Manchester City FC), Melhor Jogadora do Ano de 2020 da FIFA, recorda a sua carreira e partilha algumas afirmações surpreendentes.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: Megacities é um documentário sobre as favelas de quatro cidades metropolitanas diferentes: Bombaim, Cidade do México, Moscou e Nova York. O filme é um relato em doze episódios sobre pessoas que lutam para sobreviver com desenvoltura, humor e dignidade.

programme.title: Overdosed
programme.desc: O inquietante turbilhão da mortífera crise dos opiácios nos EUA é revelado na pequena cidade rural de Petersburg, West Virginia, o estado mais duramente afetado por esta epidemia.

programme.title: Maravilhosos perdedores: um mundo diferente
programme.desc: Por trás das equipas de elite do ciclismo mundial, há lutadores desconhecidos, verdadeiros heróis do ciclismo que caem, levantam-se e voltam. Uma odisséia que revela um olhar incomum sobre os “maravilhosos perdedores”, aqueles que sacrificam as suas carreiras profissionais pela glória dos seus companheiros de equipa.O que os motiva a continuar, a pedalar no absoluto anonimato, num dos desportos mais exigentes física e psicologicamente? Seguimos estes “Sancho Pança” do ciclismo profissional durante 7 anos e descobrimos a vida, até então invisível, destes homens, sem os quais as equipas profissionais ficariam sem pódio, nem troféu.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.desc: Um Clássico de Futebol | Território Inimigo

programme.title: Episódios 3-4
programme.desc: A maldição | Os Vizinhos

programme.title: Os Segredos de La Roja – Campeões do Mundo 2010

Apesar desse final bem-sucedido, “La Roja” teve que superar várias lutas e dificuldades para se tornar lendário. A equipa chegou à África do Sul com o triunfo do Campeonato Europeu de Futebol de 2008 e Vicente del Bosque a liderar o trajeto. Havia um sentimento geral de favoritismo atribuído a ""La Roja"" e, embora a derrota contra a Suíça no primeiro jogo tenha sido chocante, motivou Del Bosque e a sua equipa a unirem-se e a concentrarem-se com uma única intenção: bom futebol; e um objetivo: fazer história.

programme.title: Rumeysa: De cabeça erguida
programme.desc: Com 2,15 m de altura, a impressionante estatura de Rumeysa Gelgi é apenas comparável à sua assombrosa força interior. Rumeysa Gelgi nasceu com uma mutação genética rara, a síndrome de Weaver. E a vida não tem sido fácil para a mulher mais alta do mundo. Agora, graças a uma cirurgia que lhe mudou a vida, está pronta a viajar pela primeira vez aos EUA para conhecer algumas das mulheres mais inspiradoras do mundo. Na sua viagem de autodescoberta, Rumeysa contará a sua história e aprenderá junto com outras mulheres que detêm recordes do Livro Guiness.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora da Bundesliga e jogadora do AC Milan Julia Simic parte de Nuremberga para apanhar Dafina Redzepi (TSG Hoffenheim) e visitar Bärbel Wohlleben, que tem a honra de ter sido a primeira mulher que marcou um Golo do Mês da ARD Sportschau. Julia mostra-nos o campo de futebol que criou para que as raparigas possam começar a jogar, enquanto Bärbel recorda os seus anos de infância e o modo como a federação alemã de futebol (DFB) baniu as mulheres da prática do futebol profissional. As três irão jogar nas margens do Reno enquanto conversam sobre a paixão que partilham pelo futebol.

programme.title: Episódios 7-8
programme.desc: A Tormenta de 18 Dias | Um Novo Começo

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carolina Morace, em Roma, revela-se uma mulher de caráter forte, sem medo de se assumir como pioneira em qualquer domínio, como quando se torna na primeira mulher a marcar quatro golos no estádio de Wembley. Barbara Bonansea, jogadora da Juventus escolhida para a Seleção Mundial da FIFA/FIFPro de 2020, está com a sua família, incluindo a avó, que a apoiou no seu desejo de se tornar futebolista. Benedetta Orsi, jogadora noviça do US Sassuolo, fala com otimismo sobre o modo como ultrapassou a doença que a forçou a desistir do ténis mas lhe deu a oportunidade de desenvolver a sua paixão pelo futebol.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Vamos lá, submundo!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1987!
programme.desc: A year in which Stock, Aitken & Waterman cranked out an endless stream of massive, catchy hits - these are the classic music videos that made 1987!

programme.title: The 1987 POWER Hour!
programme.desc: 60 minutes of power pop & rock! Earplugs at the ready as we rewind to 1987 with GnR, Aerosmith, Duran Duran, Cher, T'Pau & Whitesnake!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1987
programme.desc: Jenny Powell flicks through the pages of another Yearbook. 1987 had 'No Limits' on the TV & Stock, Aitken & Waterman cranking an endless stream of massive, catchy hits!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1987!
programme.desc: A year in which Stock, Aitken & Waterman cranked out an endless stream of massive, catchy hits - these are the classic music videos that made 1987!

programme.title: Way Back When! 1987
programme.desc: 60 minutes of lesser heard hits from 1987. Including Nick Kamen, Kenny G, Climie Fisher, The Jets & Boogie Box High.

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1987
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1987
programme.desc: Hits & headlines from the year of Black Monday, Dirty Dancing, the beginning of the Channel Tunnel, and the end of music TV show 'The Tube'.

programme.title: The Best 1987 Party - Ever!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The Best 1987 Party - Ever!
programme.desc: 2 hours of the biggest party tunes - all from 1987. Including Whitney, Spagna, Pet Shop Boys, Michael Jackson & The Proclaimers.

programme.title: Who Had The Most Hits in the 80s?
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Who Had The Most Hits in the 80s?
programme.desc: Counting down the 40 acts with more Top 10 hits to their names than any other stars of the decade. U2, Shaky, Queen, Wham & Prince are all here, but who's No.1?

programme.title: 80s Dance Party Night!
programme.desc: Trying to impress someone with your cool moves? Give these a go, as we party into the night on NOW 80s.

programme.title: Sinitta's High Energy Hits! Top 25
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Sinitta's High Energy Hits! Top 25
programme.desc: From Evelyn Thomas' High Energy in 1984, through Stock Aitken & Waterman & onto the breakout of happy house at the end of the decade, it's Sinitta's dance session - full of bounce!

programme.title: Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.desc: We didn't yet call them Power Ballads, but some masters of the genre - Boston, Toto & Whitesnake - were already at it! Simes has 25 power pop love songs & ballads - in order.

programme.title: Rod Stewart: 1971-1979
programme.desc: With 14 top 10 hits, Rod was beaten only by Elvis & Abba in the 70s. Here are 10 great videos, in order, from Maggie May onwards including a couple you may have forgotten!

programme.title: Drifting Away! Top 60
programme.desc: 60 laid-back & relaxing songs from the 70s... time to Drift Away with Dobie Gray, Safe Cafe, Ralph McTell, The Eagles & Roberta Flack.

programme.title: 70s Love Songs
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.desc: We didn't yet call them Power Ballads, but some masters of the genre - Boston, Toto & Whitesnake - were already at it! Simes has 25 power pop love songs & ballads - in order.

programme.title: Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates' Rock Ballads! 1970-79
programme.desc: We didn't yet call them Power Ballads, but some masters of the genre - Boston, Toto & Whitesnake - were already at it! Simes has 25 power pop love songs & ballads - in order.

programme.title: Top of the 70s Charts
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Top of the 70s Charts
programme.desc: 3 hours of bona fide classics from the best decade of music - every one of them made UK number 1. With rock, disco, soul, pop & more!

programme.title: Pat Sharp's Karaoke Party!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Pat Sharp's Karaoke Party!
programme.desc: Come prepared, as those vocal chords are going to see a lot of action as we spend 3 nostalgic hours with Pat Sharp's 70s house party. All gatecrashers welcome!

programme.title: Groovy Little Numbers!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: Art School Cool! 1970-79
programme.desc: Art-school innovators, cool mavericks and risk-taking heroes all combine in this heady two-hour mix of stars who often pushed music way beyond the confines of chart-based pop.

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.1s of the 70s!
programme.desc: Mark Goodier's 7 hour marathon run through of some of the biggest number 1 videos of the 1970s. From Edison Lighthouse to Pink Floyd via lots of Abba & Rod Stewart!

programme.title: 1972 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1972!

programme.title: The Best 1972 Party...Ever!
programme.desc: Blimey, what a year! Get ready to turn your telly up LOUD, with the greatest party anthems from '72 including Bowie, Slade, The Sweet & The Osmonds. Don't forget your Ding-a-Ling!

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.1s of the 70s!
programme.desc: Mark Goodier's 7 hour marathon run through of some of the biggest number 1 videos of the 1970s. From Edison Lighthouse to Pink Floyd via lots of Abba & Rod Stewart!

programme.title: 1972 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1972!

programme.title: The Best 1972 Party...Ever!
programme.desc: Blimey, what a year! Get ready to turn your telly up LOUD, with the greatest party anthems from '72 including Bowie, Slade, The Sweet & The Osmonds. Don't forget your Ding-a-Ling!

programme.title: Time Machine! 1969 v 79 v 89
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Time Machine! 1969 v 79 v 89
programme.desc: Jumping back & forth - 30 songs separated by 3 decades. One from 69, followed by 79 then 89 and finally back to the beginning!

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: The 30 Grooviest Stars of the 60s!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The 30 Grooviest Stars of the 60s!
programme.desc: Another NOW 70s special looking back 1 decade further with the ultimate countdown of 60s stars! Including The Stones, The Beach Boys, Lulu, Sandie Shaw, Marvin Gaye & The Beatles.

programme.title: Rick Wakeman's 70s Rock Down!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Rick Wakeman's 70s Rock Down!
programme.desc: Producer, keyboardist, presenter, prog rock god, and grumpy man extraordinaire Rick Wakeman presets the ultimate 70s Rock Down - from Free to Kiss via The Who & Fleetwood Mac.

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: John, Paul, George & Ringo!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 John, Paul, George & Ringo!
programme.desc: Following their 60s world domination, The Beatles went their separate ways with varying degrees of musical success! Here are some solo videos by the Fab Four from the 1970s & 80s.

programme.title: 25 Years of The Stones! 1964-1989
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 25 Years of The Stones! 1964-1989
programme.desc: 20 famous songs from The Rolling Stones' golden period - in order. Including classics like Jumpin' Jack Flash, Harlem Shuffle, It's All Over Now & Sympathy for the Devil.

programme.title: The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: 60s v 70s Mixtape!
programme.desc: 28 hit songs, 14 top artists - one track as they were in the 60s, and another in the 70s - simple! From The Kinks to The King, John Lennon to Johnny Cash.

programme.title: Carol Decker's 70s Rock Gods!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Carol Decker's 70s Rock Gods!
programme.desc: From Bowie & Black Sabbath to The Police, Thin Lizzy & Status Quo. 25 guitar greats from a classic decade of rock chosen by T'Pau's Carol Decker.

programme.title: 70s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & guitar action - all night!

programme.title: School Disco of Rock! Top 30
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 School Disco of Rock! Top 30
programme.desc: Back to the 70s & back to the school disco for some proper full-on guitar action! Including Status Quo, Blondie, AC/DC, Bruce Springsteen & Queen.

programme.title: Road Grill

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and the boys have their annual 4 on 4 basketball tournament and then a giant red meat fest. Testosterone rules the table as they dig into Rob's feast of beef short ribs, rotisserie prime rib, grilled porterhouse steaks and a killer Caesar salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob puts on a backyard fundraiser to help out the local kids soccer team. He entices them with Butterfly prawns with chili raspberry sauce, Tandoori spiced cauliflower, and fried smoked chicken drumsticks.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbecuing bananas, that's crazy. Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill the delicate, evERS-scrumptious fruit. Bananas.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Collard Greens, Maple Syrup, Goat Cheddar and Heirloom Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera prepares a frittata, rosemary skewer chicken and grilled bread salad with fresh ingredients from a local farmers' market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Broccoli, Rainbow Chard and Herbs
programme.desc: Warm host Amanda Herrera picks up colourful produce and herbs at a farmers' market to make a delicious appetizer and tasty cold oil French fries.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob likes to Rock and Roll all night and BBQ every Saturday. This time he rocks out with his buddy Jim's Band "Giver". While they belt out the tunes, Rob creates his own hits with grilled lamb chops, crispy potato skins, beef brisket and smoked Proscuitto wrapped shrimp.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob challenges some rodeo-riding friends from Texas to a race on horseback. He falls a little short leaving him in charge of making and paying for dinner. He ropes together a cowboy feast including stuffed Texmex pork roast, smoked veal shoulder, spicy chicory sausage salad and grits on the grill.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and his team visit the tennis club and serve up some grilled eats for the club members. Smoked Salmon, Beef Tenderloin with Cherry Sauce, Asparagus with Citrus Butter with a Grand Slam Beet Salad are the perfect match after a long day on the courts

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team prepare BBQ Sunday Dinner with ingredients from the Farmers Market. Herbed Prime Rib, Grilled Pork Chops with Garlic and Herbs, Roasted Root Veggies with Mustard Glaze, and Yorkshire pudding will please friends and family alike!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: This episode kicks off with Spencer's tasty Grilled Caesar Salad. He skillfully piles of char-grilled romaine lettuce wedges and sourdough croutons are topped with tangy dressing, crispy pancetta, and shards of a homemade parmesan tuile. For his next recipe, Spencer whips up Grilled Zucchini Boats that filled with fresh ingredients including orzo pasta, summer veggies, and herbs. Chef Watts loves a good steak and his Grilled Cauliflower Steak is not one to be passed up! Dusted in Middle Eastern Spices, flame roasted and served with chili-spiked, Yemeni 'Skhug' hot sauce and pomegranate seeds. Finally, Spencer steams tender artichokes, stuffing these flowers with breadcrumbs and...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-master's social feed is 'meat on a stick' - and Chef Spencer's Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative 'Tornado Potato' which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob throws a hot Mardi Gras party with a Cajun Creole Menu. There's no parade, but there is great food, fabulous music and beads galore! Skillet Cornbread, Cajun catfish, and creole smoked ribs get this party going an keep it going all night long.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Men love beer. Men love fire. Men love to eat. Put it all together and you get a backyard full of men feasting off of a beer inspired barbecued meal including roasted chicken on a beer can, beer wings, beer burgers and even a beer dressing for potato salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Using internationally inspired recipes, Matt and the Road Grill team take us on a taste bud tour around the world with Stuffed Peppers, Bison Burgers with Oka Cheese, Tandoori Lamb Ribs and Tea Smoked Hoisin Duck.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides & Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Pork was Made for Barbeques
programme.desc: Pork and the grill are good buddies and host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favourite pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms fresh market ingredients into two irresistible dishes, including a one pot Lamb Curry with Honeycomb.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Patty Pan Summer Squash and Cabbage
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera grills up two dinner recipes using patty pan summer squash and cabbage that she picked up from the market.

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on creamy sauces! First a duo of creamy butter sauces with salmon! Next up a sauce créme with beef tenderloin and a vegan coconut créme anglaise!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on savoury sauces! First up, a soy-miso-honey sauce for seared duck breast! Next, a black demi-glace for hanger steak and a sauce duxelles for scallops!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on spicy sauces! First up, a Cajun comeback sauce for soft-shelled crab! Next, a classic steakhouse mustard sauce and a ginger caramel sauce for ginger caramel apples!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on wine sauces! First up, a classic veal marsala! Next, a white wine chicken gravy and a port sabayon with grapes!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser that's easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencer's "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: In this bacon loving episode, Chef Spencer delivers a tasty Bacon Weave Turkey Breast, which gets injected with beer and spices before being wrapped up in its cozy bacon blanket and sent off to the grill! Next up? A Peameal Bacon Roast with Rosti. This heavy hunk of back bacon gets smoked to flavourful perfection while Chef Watts makes the crispiest golden-fried-to-perfection potato pancake. Then, Spencer whips up a charry, grilled, super decadent, bacon-wrapped and bacon stuffed cheeseburger. Spencer isn't finished with bacon yet! For his final recipe, Spencer stuffs an apple with decadent crispy morsels stuffed along with savoury caramelized onions and melty cheddar cheese.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 City Breaks Bikaner, India
programme.desc: Bikaner is known to most people as the city of world-famous savoury snacks. When Asmita goes there for a whirlwind trip, however, she discovers that there is a lot more to Rajasthan’s Red City than meets the eye. From the miniature paintings that can be found on the walls of palaces and mansions across the city to the elaborate architecture of the former havelis of merchants, she finds out that Bikaner is an art lover’s paradise.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 World Spas Movenpick, Jordan
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries many different spa treatments, which leave her skin glowing, at the Movenpick Resort in Jordan.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: The Savvy Nomad
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Savvy Nomad Koh Tao, Thailand
programme.desc: Emeline visits Koh Tao - a small island in the Gulf of Thailand often referred to as a ‘diver’s paradise’.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 City Breaks Udaipur, India
programme.desc: What can Udaipur offer you on a quick getaway? Luxury? Romance? A chance to go back in time? Is that all? Asmita goes on a short break to Udaipur to find out the best things to do in Rajasthan’s most glamorous city. From uncovering sagas of Rajput bravery at the memorials built for the Rajputs who ruled the city to taking a horseback tour in Udaipur’s lesser-known countryside, she discovers that this is a city waiting to be explored.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan tree, Maldives (PT)
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try bungee jumping at Kobae Bridge. They also explore the nature and mythology in Takachiho.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Six hundred years ago, Brussels was just a nice place to stop and buy a waffle on the way to France. Exploring the capital of Belgium today, Catriona realizes that it’s a city where the historic Grand Palace and a hip museum of the world’s oldest and latest cars co-exist. It’s the city where the quirkiness of Mannekin-Pis meets the futuristic approach seen in the Atomium. It’s the city where traditional Belgian chocolates can be savored after a visit to the multicultural Mini Europe park.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Acre, starting from El Jazzar mosque and Citadel fortress. Next day she travels to Mizpe Hayamim and then explores the town of Capernaum.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica get to know about the dark history of Estonia while exploring the remains of Narva, the country’s third largest city at its easternmost limit. From the fortress of Narva and the bastions of Narva to an abandoned textile mill, everything tells them about the intriguing story of the town. They also learn about the Russian and ‘alien’ people living here.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try bungee jumping at Kobae Bridge. They also explore the nature and mythology in Takachiho.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Six hundred years ago, Brussels was just a nice place to stop and buy a waffle on the way to France. Exploring the capital of Belgium today, Catriona realizes that it’s a city where the historic Grand Palace and a hip museum of the world’s oldest and latest cars co-exist. It’s the city where the quirkiness of Mannekin-Pis meets the futuristic approach seen in the Atomium. It’s the city where traditional Belgian chocolates can be savored after a visit to the multicultural Mini Europe park.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Acre, starting from El Jazzar mosque and Citadel fortress. Next day she travels to Mizpe Hayamim and then explores the town of Capernaum.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica get to know about the dark history of Estonia while exploring the remains of Narva, the country’s third largest city at its easternmost limit. programme.title: The Savvy Nomad
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Savvy Nomad Bangkok, Thailand
programme.desc: From meeting the “Queen of Bangkok Street Food” to eating Pad Thai at the place where it was born, Emeline lives a foodie’s dream in Bangkok.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica soak in the vitality of the student town, Tartu, and experience its eccentricities at the Leaning House and the AHHAA Science Centre. Following this, they visit Obinista, the cultural centre of Setomaa, where the Seto community introduces them to the traditional ways of dressing, singing and dancing. They also indulge in a traditional smoke sauna at nearby Võromaa.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina in Jerusalem, takes a guided tour of City of David and visits Western Wall, learning about its significance. Ending with Cardo and Mahane Yehuda Markets.

programme.title: The Savvy Nomad
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Savvy Nomad Lampung, Thailand
programme.desc: At an elephant conservation centre in Lampang, Emeline experiences the immense love that the Thai people feel for their national animal.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Ein Gedi oasis and Masada plateau on her way to Eilat, where she visits the beaches, Red Canyon and Wadi Shani.

programme.title: The Savvy Nomad
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Savvy Nomad Chiang Rai, Thailand
programme.desc: While exploring the extraordinary temples in Chiang Rai, Emeline begins to uncover the stories hidden in their fascinating architecture.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 City Breaks Bikaner, India
programme.desc: Bikaner is known to most people as the city of world-famous savoury snacks. When Asmita goes there for a whirlwind trip, however, she discovers that there is a lot more to Rajasthan’s Red City than meets the eye. From the miniature paintings that can be found on the walls of palaces and mansions across the city to the elaborate architecture of the former havelis of merchants, she finds out that Bikaner is an art lover’s paradise.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 World Spas Movenpick, Jordan
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries many different spa treatments, which leave her skin glowing, at the Movenpick Resort in Jordan.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: The Savvy Nomad
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Savvy Nomad Koh Tao, Thailand
programme.desc: Emeline visits Koh Tao - a small island in the Gulf of Thailand often referred to as a ‘diver’s paradise’.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 City Breaks Udaipur, India
programme.desc: What can Udaipur offer you on a quick getaway? Luxury? Romance? A chance to go back in time? Is that all? Asmita goes on a short break to Udaipur to find out the best things to do in Rajasthan’s most glamorous city. From uncovering sagas of Rajput bravery at the memorials built for the Rajputs who ruled the city to taking a horseback tour in Udaipur’s lesser-known countryside, she discovers that this is a city waiting to be explored.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Unwind Banyan tree, Maldives (PT)
programme.desc: Indeya unwinds at the Banyan Tree resort. She tries water sports, learns a traditional Maldivian recipe, rejuvenates herself at a spa and ends her day by exploring the capital city of Male.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Bucket List Hitoyoshi, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty ride in a classic steam locomotive to Hitoyoshi, where they enjoy a relaxing hot spring bath in the mountainside.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Despite the boom of the 21st century development, Tallinn, the 1000-year-old capital of Estonia, safeguards its UNESCO-listed medieval Old Town, one of Europe’s most complete walled cities. Marco Biagioli and Erica Melargo, a famous Italian nomad couple, lose themselves in its fairy-tale charms, and find out its legends. They also visit iconic attractions such as Alexander Nevsky Cathedral and Raeapteek, the oldest pharmacy in Europe that has continuously been in business in the same building.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: On a short break in Belfast, the capital of Northern Ireland, Olivia, an avid traveller, finds herself infected by the energy of the city at a traditional Victorian market. At the city’s main attractions like Belfast City Hall and Belfast Castle, she gets to know its history. She also visits the Ulster Museum, which tells her stories about the Egyptians in Ireland, and Titanic Belfast, which makes the grand ship and its downfall come alive for her.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Backpack Tel Aviv, Israel
programme.desc: Sabrina visits Israel and first explores Sarona, including its local market, and tries local food and wine. Her next stop is Jaffa exploring its flea market ending with Shakshuka Shushka.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland

programme.title: Adventure Bike TV
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 Adventure Bike TV: Episode 5: BMW GS
programme.desc: In the final episode, Graham asks a simply but provocative question, is the BMW GS, still a GS? Tales from the trails heads to an end at a motocross track. Tom talks about a second inspirational person, who you all might know and Graham goes on his 24 hour adventure, in a van.

programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.title: Adrian Newey Confirmed - Are Aston Martin Set for F1 Success?
programme.desc: Despite it being possibly F1's worst kept secret in recent years, today Aston Martin announced that Adrian Newey will join the F1 team, starting March 2025 as Managing Technical Partner as well a shareholder - for an eye-watering amount of money too. But does Adrian Newey complete Lawrence Stroll's dream lineup for Aston Martin to succeed in F1 and fight for championship titles? Jon Noble and Ben Hunt chat at Aston's facilities.

programme.title: Sickline - Die Dokumentation
programme.desc: 150 der weltbesten Wildwasserkajakfahrer aus zahlreichen Ländern treffen sich, um auf der legendären "Wellerbrücke" den Sickline Extreme Kayak World Champion zu ermitteln. Die Strecke hat den Ruf, die Eiger-Nordwand des Wildwasserkajaksports zu sein und bietet somit die perfekte Kulisse, um den Weltmeister im Extremkajak-Rennsport zu küren

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU)
programme.desc: Bei der diesjährigen Jubiläumsausgabe gehen Teilnehmer aus über 55 Nationen an den Start, darunter die weltbesten Hard-Enduro-Fahrer wie Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023 - The Stars of Big Air
programme.desc: Heute machen wir einen großen Sprung zur GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023. Einige der besten Surfer der Welt messen sich in der spektakulärsten Kiteboarding-Disziplin - dem Big Air.

programme.title: SPAR Swiss Epic 2023
programme.desc: Vom 15. bis 19. August kämpfen Zweierteams im malerischen Graubünden um den Gesamtsieg und wichtige UCI-Mountainbike-Punkte beim Swiss Epic. Mit mehr als 350km und fast 12.000 Höhenmetern wird den besten Mountainbikern alles abverlangt.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY
programme.desc: Ever wondered what goes through someone’s mind as they jump from a helicopter above the Canadian Rockies? Then ride along with the Team KAVU athletes as they wingsuit, skydive, and speedride above scenic Fernie, British Columbia.

programme.title: Natural Selection Tour 2022 - Jackson Hole, USA
programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions.

programme.title: Salomon Golden Trails - Series
programme.desc: Welcome to this week´s episode of World of Freesports. Today we travel to the Canary Islands – to El Hiero, Spain. We will be witnessing one of the hardest and most iconic trail running events in Europe – the Salomon Golden Trail.

programme.title: Profile - Aurelien Routens (Freeride Snowboard)
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France is a free-spirited, adventurous snowboarder who has excelled in competition and exploration, having numerous first descents to his name. He was runner-up in the 2013 Freeride World Tour.

programme.title: Skitouren Dokumentation
programme.desc: Weiße Gipfel, einsame Hänge und unberührte Natur: Skibergsteigen ist der größte alpine Trend und die wohl am schnellsten wachsende Bergsportart.

programme.title: Meet Connor Herson
programme.desc: Connor Herson pushes the limits of what is possible on the rock. But his latest and greatest challenge? Balancing a life climbing cutting edge ascents with his studies at Stanford.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Sand Series Saarlouis Classic (GER)
programme.desc: Die Sand Series kehrt noch in diesem Monat an den Ort zurück, an dem alles begann: nach Saarlouis, wo die Serie 2021 erstmals stattfand. Der ehemalige Weltranglistenerste Michele Cappelletti wird zum ersten Mal mit André Baran antreten.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series Round #3 & #4

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championships
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode besuchen wir die zukünftigen Formular 1 Stars bei der FIA Karting Europameisterschaft 2023 in Cremona, Italien. Schnallen Sie sich an und starten Sie Ihre Motoren, denn wir werden gleich auf Platz 1 fahren.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series #5 & World Rookie Tour Finals

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour The Stars of Freestyle

programme.title: WES World E-Bike Series #6 & #7

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Neom (KSA)

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: At the ExCeL Arena in London, England on March 23, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Tyrone Spong and Remy Bonjasky as headliner, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: On the preliminary card, a 4-Man Featherweight Contender Tournament and other one-off bouts were featured.Mirko Cro Cop was first scheduled to face Pat Barry, and later Sergei Kharitonov on this card. However, on May 21, it was announced that Kharitonov had to withdraw from the fight due to injury. He was replaced by Jarrell Miller.Miguel Torres was scheduled to make his GLORY debut as a participant of the Featherweight tournament. However, on May 28, it was revealed he pulled out of the tournament for undisclosed reasons. He was replaced by Marcus Vinicius.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 GLORY Last Man Standing
programme.desc: "Last Man Standing" features a lineup of the world's top Middleweight talent: EIGHT men will fight to the finish in a ONE night tournament, with the tournament winner being crowned the GLORY Middleweight Champion of the World. Last Man Standing will also feature TWO World Title fights, including Daniel Ghita versus Rico Verhoeven for the vacant Heavyweight Title, and Marc de Bonte versus Joseph Valtellini as de Bonte defends his newly won Welterweight Title.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Fabricio Santos De Jesus was introduced to Judo as a child while he was still living in Brazil. He was also introduced to Capoeira, becoming Champion of Brazil and International Capoeira Champion. He has been able to transfer his knowledge of the control of movement and is now recognized for this knowledge as a coach in MMA community. Hard Knocks Fighter Jess Elverum, among others, using his teachings to expand their flexibility and dexterity, becoming more fluid and calm in movement.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Josh Lee is highly respected in the MMA community for his wrestling skills. In this episode, we follow Josh throughout his day, and see some well known HK fighters who have trained under him, such as Jess Elverum. It is Josh's hope that his ability to transfer his knowledge of wrestling will make big difference in his students' fighting. He would also love to see more people take up wrestling.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Jesse Arnett attributes most of his success to his coaches, in particular Jake Peacock. Jake was born with only a partial arm. This coach and fighter doesn't let that stop him from training some of the best athletes in the world.

programme.title: Fight Vault - HK48 - Episode 3
programme.desc: Hard Knocks 48 continues with more action packed MMA! We kick off this show with a great amateur fight between Dale Tallman and Chris Smeltzer. Following is the Main event of the evening, a professional Light Heavyweight Title Fight between UFC Veteran Rodney Wallace and TUF finalist Dan Spohn. You are in for five rounds of MMA action, so do not miss it!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.desc: Watch Tom Segura reunite with Sean Evans over a brand new hot sauce lineup, discussing everything from Dave Chappelle's surprise special to his beef with pro wrestling and love for Missy Elliott.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Eventually, Segura ends up with tears streaming from his eyes but is it the hot sauce or the tender words from BFF Bert Kreischer? Find out in this scorching new episode of "Hot Ones."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Bob Saget became a household name on the classic sitcom Full House as well as a legend on the standup stage.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The King of Queens tries to become the King of Hot Sauce while talking about everything from UFC fandom to Hitch lore to the preeminence of Long Island pizza.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Comedian Tom Arnold has been through it all: a public divorce from Roseanne Barr, a harrowing season of "I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here!" and all the slings and arrows of Hollywood life. Will "Hot Ones" be his most daunting foe yet?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The multitalented actor and former physician Ken Jeong faces off against the wings of death. Jeong dispels common medical myths, discusses encounters with NBA legends like Shaq and Kevin Durant and even gives Sean a free check-up.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Chelsea Handler battles the wings of death with Sean Evans and discusses dogs, thirst traps, 50 Cent and so much more.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The comedian discusses tech bros, breaks down his favorite video games and explains his obsession with "The X-Files." Kumail becomes the first guest in "Hot Ones" history to dine with a knife and fork.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: This time, Pharoah dives deeper into his comedy career, summons characters like Joe Rogan and Nic Cage to the table and delivers some of the hottest bars in rap history.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Ramy Youssef is a Golden Globe Award-winning actor, writer and comedian best known for his lead role in "Ramy," the Emmy-nominated and Peabody Award-winning comedy series.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: David Harbour is an Emmy- and Tony-nominated actor taking on the wings of death and discusses everything from Shakespeare to penguins to underground poker clubs.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Winterfell legend Maisie Williams battles the (vegan) wings of death and discusses everything from appearing on Binging with Babish to "Game of Thrones" myths and that time Drake shouted her out at the Billboard Music Awards.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Ramy Youssef is a Golden Globe Award-winning actor, writer and comedian best known for his lead role in "Ramy," the Emmy-nominated and Peabody Award-winning comedy series.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Jon Bernthal is an actor starring in TV shows like "The Walking Dead," but how is he with spicy food?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: How will Steve-O fare in his second round with the wings of death? Find out as he discusses his memoir 'Professional Idiot,' his skateboard decks and his own Steve-O Hot Sauce!

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The Jackass alum has been gored by bulls and shot in the chest, but can he survive the wings of death?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: A dear friend of "Hot Ones," Adam Richman, takes on the sauces and wings while discussing his top five iconic Brooklyn eating establishments, the influence of WWII on how Americans eat today, urban gardening tips and his favorite food rap lyrics.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Alton sits down for his date with Sean and the wings of death. As he meticulously reorders the hot sauces to his own ranking, Alton tackles everything from the history of food TV to Eminem lyrics to the art of a bottle of champagne.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: As she battles the wings of death, Issa breaks down millennial dating terms, explains how she may have inspired Cardi B and graces the "Hot Ones" stage with one of its most memorable musical performances.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Trevor Noah discusses the advice he got from Jon Stewart, breaks down the joys of biltong and explains the one thing that connects us all as humans.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Kenan is a bonafide TV legend who has been making us laugh for over 25 years. But can he last in our hot seat?

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Kristen Bell has a career in TV and film that includes everything from box office smashes to cult classics.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The man behind "Punk'd" takes on the wings of death and covers a wide gamut of topics from Diddy stories and court side shenanigans to biochemistry and Elon Musk.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Vanessa Hudgens is a megastar known for "High School Musical" and roles in cult movies like "Spring Breakers."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Zac Efron takes on the wings of death with Sean Evans, channeling Shia LaBeouf as he pops bottles of hot sauce along the way. From throwback basketball tricks to paparazzi advice from Leonardo DiCaprio, this episode has it all!
